comments.author: @PCMBcollections
comments.text:
This unforgettable day, June 29, 2024, will forever be etched in my memory. India chose to bat first, but soon found themselves struggling at 3 wickets down. However, Kohli, determined to make a mark, took charge and delivered a phenomenal performance, ably supported by Axar and Dube. During our bowling spell, Arshdeep, Bumrah, and Axar shone bright, with Axar's 15th over being a game-changer for SA.Equations changed. They needed 30 from 30. Just when South Africa seemed poised to win their maiden title, Bumrah's 16th over and Hardik's crucial wicket of Klassen turned the tide. Our bowlers, led by Bumrah, Arshdeep, and Pandya, ensured India's triumphant win, making it a perfect farewell for Rohit and Kohli. I was filled with unwavering belief, even when South Africa needed 30 runs from 30 balls. Thank you, India, for this historic victory! Long live India! 🇮🇳
